profile:
Welcome to Rosales W&D, the purpose of this site is to assist You with finding the perfect product to Affordably Personalize your home.  With over 10 years experience, we can say that we have mastered our craft.  Our products are showcased around the City in residential homes and private estates.  Every year, thousands of clients choose us for their projects mainly because of our professionalism, attention to detail and our one of a kind buying experience which ensures customer satisfaction every time!  And if you're here, it's because you have not yet found what you're looking for.  We believe it's not enough to simply meet your expectations-we must exceed them.

*****
 
We take great pride in our wide variety of Products & Services such as Window Glass Replacements, Glass Shower Enclosures & Partitions, Mirrors, Glass Railings,
Wrought Iron Inserts, Decorative Glass Inserts, Door Systems etc.

*****
Rosales W&D has been servicing Toronto and the surrounding areas for many years.

*****

Rosales W&D
Delivering Quality to Your Home
 
rosaleswd@gmail.com
(416) 456-0937 / (416) 220-1484

profile: Grand Merit Construction provides renovation and handyman services. Working with a trusted team, we keep us accountable throughout the entire work. We keep an eye on workmanship, budget and schedule to ensure that we deliver a quality work at the lowest costs on time. We offer a unique client experience that includes constant communication with you through the entire work. We will work closely with you to make sure that you are completely satisfied. We are licensed and fully insured (General Liability Insurance and WSIB). We have years of experience and we have pre-employment screening. We use the best tools to get your work done right. If you have any questions regarding any of our services, please visit us at www.grandmerit.ca, give us a call on +1 (647) 556-5100 or email us at info@grandmerit.ca

profile:
Welcome Home Contracting is a family owned business located in the Greater Toronto Area. We realize life can get busy & the "to do list" at home easily piles up. Welcome Home Contracting hopes to remove some of the burden resulting in more time to do what you want to do. We take pride in our work and we look forward to hearing from you! 

No job is too small...Here are a few services we offer but are not limited to: 
drywall repairs, trim work, light fixture installation, painting, backsplash, faucet/toilet/vanity installs, demolition, full bathroom renovations, furniture assembly, flooring (hardwood, laminate, vinyl, tile, etc.), wallpaper, feature walls, barn board, fireplace brick removal & closure if required.

profile:
A Handyman 4 Hire is a fully insured company serving Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Oakville, Milton and surrounding areas. We have been providing services to these communities since 2005 in a fast friendly and professional manner. We offer a wide variety of Handyman services that can be customized to meet our client's needs. We are dedicated to providing quality service that deliver maximum satisfaction to both residential and commercial clients.

We specialize in small jobs; we turn that " honey do list" into that "honey done list"

We provide high quality work at reasonable rates while providing special attention to the details. This in turn ensures that most of our business comes from client referrals.

We hope that you will be our next client.

https://www.instagram.com/ahandyman4hire/

profile:
Our company has been consistently recognized by many of our clients as one of the most reliable companies they have come across. We take great pride in that and look forward to maintaining our reputation.

Military Maintenance and Military Maid was founded on the principles of reliability, quality workmanship, and fair pricing. We pride ourselves on helping our customers complete their projects on time and within budget.

The Military Maintenance branch includes carpenters, plumbers, electricians, painters and professional handyman to complete any project you have in mind. We Work Closely with Our team to get best results.

The Military Maid branch of our team handles all the heavy duty cleaning services required at homes and offices. We can clean anything with no job being too big for our team, weve seen it all. 



MILITARY MAID

Our team of dedicated professionals will treat your home like their own. We will always provide our honest and professional opinion to ensure you get the best advice for your home.
Our in-house team of professionals can handle all tasks from large scale renovations to down to the smallest repairs. What does this mean? It means you get the highest quality of work without paying the large markup fees associated when work is subcontracted out. Our hands approach ensures a high level of quality is maintained and pricing is what it should be?
Did you know? Some companies simply outsource the majority of their jobs and markup the pricing anywhere from 25% to 80%! That means you could be drastically overpaying for work by thousands of dollars. Our pricing is based on a simple and fair formula of time and materials. We dont overcharge simply because you own a nice house.
Choose us and know that our dedicated team will take care of you from start to finish and you will be paying a competitive industry price.
services:
WHAT WE OFFER
REPAIR SERVICES
If Its Broken, We Can Fix It.

CLEANING SERVICES
Have Something That Needs Light or Heavy Duty Cleaning?

RENOVATION SERVICES
Have Something That Needs To Be Rebuilt From the Ground Up? We Can Do That.

MORE SERVICES
ALWAYS DEDICATED AND DEVOTED

HOME RENOVATION
HOME REPAIRS

POST FLOOD REPAIRS

BATHROOM RENOVATION
